name: aegisos

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:shared && concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently --names "var,portfolio" --prefix-colors "yellow,magenta" "cd services/var && uvicorn var_api:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5001" "cd services/portfolio && uvicorn portfolio_api:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5002"
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --prefix shared 2>/dev/null || (cd shared && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix shared && npm run build --prefix shared && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
